summary: A detective hunts a killer who is removing girls hearts. When his own fiancée falls victim to the killer, the detective discovers the otherworldly intentions of the killer and is helped from beyond the grave by his fiancée.
cast: Yumiko Shaku|Takao Osawa|Shôsuke Tanihara|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Melissa Fahn|Kate Higgins|Yuka Itaya|Takehiro Katayama|Yumi Kikuchi|Kazuki Kitamura|Mela Lee|Kazuhito Ohba|Aya Okamoto|Tony Oliver|Sam Riegel|Michelle Ruff|Masato Sakai|Stephanie Sheh|Eihi Shiina|Christopher Corey Smith|Doug Stone|Karen Strassman|Hiromasa Taguchi|Julie Ann Taylor|Kirk Thornton|Naho Toda|Dave Wittenberg|Maiko Yamada|Terumi Yoshida|Kimika Yoshino|Kanae Uotani
keywords: heart|katana|katana sword|good versus evil|based on manga
title: Sky High
